articles.title: Raccoon Stealer is back with a new version to steal your passwords - BleepingComputer
articles.description: The Raccoon Stealer malware is back with a second major version circulating on cybercrime forums, offering hackers elevated password-stealing functionality and upgraded operational capacity.
